# [IMPROVEMENT] Add E2E Testing with Playwright

**Labels**: enhancement, testing, frontend, medium

---

## Description
Add end-to-end testing for critical user flows.

## Suggested Tests
- Authentication flow (sign in, sign up, sign out)
- Scrape job creation and management
- Contact viewing and filtering
- Dashboard metrics loading

## Implementation
```bash
npm install -D @playwright/test
npx playwright install
```

## Priority
**MEDIUM** - Improves code quality and confidence.
